translation.en: Like, it was completely meaningless to her.
translation.es: Como si no significara nada para ella.

translation.en: But you still got your holidate, right?
- I don't think I can do it anymore. - This is what I'm thinking, okay?
translation.es: - No creo poder seguir con esto. - Esto es lo que pienso, ¿sí?

translation.en: You go to Thanksgiving, and act like nothing has changed.
translation.es: Ve al Día de Acción de Gracias y finge que nada cambió.

translation.en: Okay. If it makes you feel better, I'll go with you.
translation.es: - Bien. - Si te hace sentir mejor, iré contigo.

translation.en: Me and Abby made a connection, remember?
translation.es: Abby y yo establecimos un vínculo, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: You made a connection - with a married mother of four? -
translation.es: ¿Estableciste un vínculo con una madre casada con cuatro hijos?

translation.en: Oh, it sounded bad when you said it like that.
translation.es: Suena mal cuando lo dices así.

translation.en: - But if she asks about me-- - She won't.
translation.es: - Si pregunta por mí… - No lo hará.

translation.en: - But if she does-- - She will not.
translation.es: - Pero si lo hace… - No lo hará.

translation.en: - Let it go. - I'm trying to let it go.
You don't wanna close one door 'cause it'll open another.
translation.es: Pero si cierras una puerta, se abrirá otra.

translation.en: Yes, you do. Shut it tight. Lock it.
translation.es: Sí, hazlo. Ciérrala fuerte. Con llave.

translation.en: - If she does-- - She will not.
translation.es: - Si lo hace… - No lo hará.
Feliz Día de Acción de Gracias.
- Feliz Día de Acción de Gracias. - Besos.

translation.en: Now, meet my new friend, Warren.
translation.es: Les presento a mi nuevo amigo, Warren.

translation.en: Ooh! Howdy- ho! Something smells great coming from this kitchen.
translation.es: Algo huele muy bien en esta cocina.

translation.en: I told you, my sister burns everything.
translation.es: Te dije que mi hermana quema todo.

translation.en: It's not burnt. It's well- done.
translation.es: No está quemado. Está bien cocido.
Para eso lo baño con su jugo.

translation.en: Kind of like my meat a little crispy.
translation.es: Me gusta la carne un poco crujiente.

translation.en: You know me. One holidate per customer.
translation.es: Me conoces. Un fiestamigo por cliente.

translation.en: But you guys seemed so happy together.
Short and sweet, honey. Everything ends eventually.
translation.es: Bueno y breve, querida. Con el tiempo, todo acaba.

translation.en: So, why sit around waiting for it to happen?
translation.es: ¿Para qué sentarme a esperar a que suceda?

translation.en: I don't want to put the leaf in.
- Just put the leaf in. - It's in the basement.
translation.es: - Pon la extensión. - Está en el sótano.

translation.en: - Mom. - We can use the piano bench.
translation.es: - Mamá. - Podemos usar el banco del piano.

translation.en: Just put the goddamn leaf in!
Nana just burnt the turkey and stuffing
translation.es: La abuela quemó el pavo, el relleno

translation.en: - Yams. Not sweet potatoes. - Yeah, I got it.
translation.es: - Batatas, no boniatos. - Sí, ya entendí.

translation.en: - claiming to be whole cranberries. - Yes.
translation.es: - que dice ser de arándanos enteros. - Sí.

translation.en: but maybe the neighbors can use it.
translation.es: pero quizá les sirva a los vecinos.

translation.en: I have to go to the store. So, you can...
translation.es: Debo ir a la tienda. Así que puedes…

translation.en: - Chip? - You know I don't eat that shit.
translation.es: - ¿Una papa? - Sabes que no como esa mierda.

translation.en: Are we gonna pretend like what happened didn't happen?
translation.es: ¿Vamos a fingir que lo que pasó no pasó?

translation.en: Okay, but for the record, I'm not the one that wanted to leave that morning.
translation.es: Que quede claro, no fui yo quien quiso irse.

translation.en: Oh, I didn't hear you asking to stay.
Well, you didn't give me a chance.
You didn't want to have sex with me in the first place.
translation.es: Para empezar, no querías tener sexo conmigo.

translation.en: You're not even that attracted to me, right?
Why can't you let that go?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te olvidas de eso?

translation.en: Because when a guy basically opens
translation.es: Porque cuando un hombre es sincero

translation.en: with the fact he doesn't find a girl attractive,
translation.es: sobre el hecho de que una chica no lo atrae,

translation.en: it kinda sets the tone for the rest of the relationship.
translation.es: marca la pauta para el resto de la relación.

translation.en: I was some random bloke at the mall.
translation.es: Yo era un desconocido en el centro comercial.

translation.en: Honestly, what do you think would have happened
if I'd said, Hey, I think you're incredibly beautiful!
translation.es: si hubiera dicho: Creo que eres muy hermosa.

translation.en: Honestly, I don't know what they are. They make me forget my name.
translation.es: No sé qué son. Me hacen olvidar mi nombre?

translation.en: There's just no way you would've gone out with me.
Especially, not on New Year's Eve.

translation.es: De hecho, puedes relajarte y seguir cogiendo

translation.en: and continue to bang all the cocktail waitresses you want between holidays.
translation.es: De hecho, puedes relajarte y seguir cogiendo con todas las camareras entre una fiesta y otra.

translation.en: No one is expecting you to drop a knee at Thanksgiving.
translation.es: Nadie espera que pidas su mano en Acción de Gracias.

translation.en: At least I'm not the asshole this time.
translation.es: Al menos esta vez no soy yo el cabrón.

translation.en: What is that supposed to mean? You think I'm being an asshole?
translation.es: ¿Qué significa eso? ¿Crees que soy una cabrona?

translation.en: You're trying so hard not to feel anything.
translation.es: Te esfuerzas mucho por no sentir nada.

translation.en: That means you're lying to both of us. And that makes you an asshole.
translation.es: Significa que nos mientes a ambos. Eso te hace una cabrona.

translation.en: Well, I'd rather be an asshole
translation.es: Prefiero ser una cabrona y no andar desesperada por las tiendas

translation.en: than so desperate for companionship that I troll the mall for a holidate.
translation.es: Prefiero ser una cabrona y no andar desesperada por las tiendas tratando de encontrar una pareja.

translation.en: No. You were desperate enough to take me up on the offer.
translation.es: No. Solo lo suficiente como para aceptar mi oferta.

translation.en: - Where are you going? - I'm going away.
I see another ugly Christmas sweater in your future!
translation.es: Veo otro feo suéter navideño en tu futuro.

translation.en: But at least I won't be alone,
translation.es: Pero, al menos, no estaré solo

translation.en: sitting at the kids table, blaming everyone else for my problems.
translation.es: sentado en la mesa de los niños, culpando a todos por mis problemas.

translation.en: I bet you money, that if Ryan Gosling waltzed down this frozen food aisle,
translation.es: Apuesto lo que sea a que si Ryan Gosling se paseara por este pasillo de comida

translation.en: and offered to take you on the ride of your life, you would still say no.
translation.es: y te ofreciera brindarte la mejor aventura de tu vida, aun así, dirías que no.

translation.en: 'Cause you'd be too afraid to get on that train.
Ryan Gosling would never do his own shopping!
translation.es: ¡Ryan Gosling nunca haría sus propias compras!

translation.en: He's way too cool for that.
translation.es: Tiene demasiada clase para hacer eso.

translation.en: Well, I think you should stop being so cheap and buy a new table.
translation.es: Deberías dejar de ser tan tacaña y comprar otra mesa.

translation.en: You're just jealous because she left it to me.
translation.es: Estás celosa porque me la dejó a mí.

translation.en: I think it's a beautiful table.
translation.es: Creo que es una mesa hermosa.

translation.en: Jesus, Sloane, what did you do?
I didn't do anything. What makes you think it was me?
translation.es: No hice nada. ¿Por qué crees que fui yo?

translation.en: Well, honey, you don't have the best track record.
translation.es: Bueno, cariño, no tienes el mejor historial.

translation.en: - Yeah, Sloane. Jack's a good guy. - Whoa. Wait a second.
translation.es: - Sí, Sloane. Jack es un buen tipo. - Un momento.

translation.en: What makes you think this was my fault?
translation.es: ¿Por qué creen que fue culpa mía?

translation.en: - If you would be honest with him. - Oh, you want me to be honest?
translation.es: - Si fueras sincera con él… - ¿Quieres que sea sincera?

translation.en: Yes. Yes. And then maybe, for once,
we could get through a holiday without your personal life ruining dinner.
translation.es: podríamos celebrar sin que tu vida personal arruine la cena.

translation.en: might be a mess, but at least I didn't kiss the Black Panther!
translation.es: podrá ser un caos, pero al menos no besé a la Pantera Negra.

translation.en: - What's the black panther? - Jackson's friend at Halloween?
translation.es: - ¿Qué es eso? - ¿El amigo de Jackson en Halloween?

translation.en: He was dressed as Black Panther. It was legit.
Wait, what? You kissed the Black Panther?
- I didn't see any tongue. - You saw them kiss and didn't tell me?
translation.es: - No vi nada de lengua. - ¿Los viste besarse y no me dijiste?

translation.en: - You can't keep secrets. - How do you know?
- You know nothing about me! - I was trick- or- treating.
translation.es: - No sabes nada de mí. - Fui a pedir dulces. Confié en ti.

translation.en: I trusted you. I let you go to a party without me!
translation.es: - No sabes nada de mí. - Fui a pedir dulces. Confié en ti. Te dejé ir a una fiesta sin mí.
Voy a todas partes sin ti.

translation.en: And you never have time for me.
translation.es: Y nunca tienes tiempo para mí.

translation.en: - All you care about is the kids! - One of us has to!
translation.es: - Solo te importan los niños. - Alguien debe ocuparse.

translation.en: - Oh, my God! He's choking! - York, do the Heimlich!
- I don't know the Heimlich. - How can you not?
Step aside! I know the Heimlich!
Stop it! He's not choking! He's having a heart attack.
translation.es: ¡Alto! No se está ahogando. Es un infarto.

translation.en: - You can ride with us, ma'am. - What? No. We're not together.
translation.es: - Puede ir con nosotros. - ¿Qué? No estamos juntos.

translation.en: - Aunt Susan, go! - You have to come with me.
translation.es: - ¡Tía Susan, ve! - Tienes que venir conmigo.

translation.en: - He's in good hands now. Let's go. - No.
translation.es: Ya está en buenas manos. Vámonos. No puedes irte. Tu pareja tuvo un infarto.

translation.en: We can't go. Your date just had a heart attack.
translation.es: No puedes irte. Tu pareja tuvo un infarto.

translation.en: I had to write his name on my arm. Look.
translation.es: Tuve que escribir su nombre en mi brazo. Mira.

translation.en: It's all my fault, you know.
I've had so many men that loved me.
Once they got too close, I backed off.
translation.es: Cuando se acercaban mucho, me alejaba.

translation.en: Is anyone here for Mr. Lupinski?
translation.es: ¿Alguien vino a ver al señor Lupinski?

translation.en: How's he doing, by the way?
It was nice to see you.
- Say something. - I can't. Let's just go.
No. You have to say something. Say anything, just--
translation.es: No. Debes decir algo. Di lo que sea, solo…

translation.en: You're the most amazing man I've ever met.
translation.es: Eres el mejor hombre que he conocido.

translation.en: So, you broke up with me.
I got scared. It's what I do.
translation.es: Me dio miedo. Es lo que hago.

translation.en: Losing you was the dumbest mistake of my life.
translation.es: Perderte fue el error más tonto de mi vida.

translation.en: Please tell me we can have another chance?
So, you're stalking him but not actually speaking to him?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿lo estás acosando pero no hablas con él?

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't call showing up outside his door and hiding stalking, but okay.
translation.es: Yo no llamaría acosar a presentarme afuera de su puerta y esconderme, pero sí.

translation.en: York and I are finally taking off our masks and getting to know each other.
translation.es: York y yo nos quitamos las máscaras y nos estamos conociendo.
Es el destino. Ve tras él.

translation.en: It's not fate. The guy practically lives at the mall.
translation.es: No es el destino. Prácticamente vive en el centro comercial.

translation.en: Aunt Sloane. Life is giving you a moment.
translation.es: Tía Sloane, la vida te está dando una oportunidad.

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. Excuse me. Coming through. Jackson!
Excuse me, sorry. I have to talk to that guy over there. Excuse me!
translation.es: Con permiso, perdón. Debo hablar con ese hombre.

translation.en: Excuse me. Excuse me. Pardon me. Jackson!
I just wanna say I fucked up.
translation.es: Solo quiero decir que la cagué.

translation.en: It's really, really hot in here. Huh!
Look, what I'm trying to say--
is I've had more fun with you in the last year
translation.es: es que me divertí más contigo en el último año

translation.en: than I've had with my loser ex- boyfriends combined.
translation.es: que con mis patéticos exnovios juntos.

translation.en: I do have feelings for you.
Letting you go has been one of the biggest mistakes of my life.
translation.es: Dejarte ir ha sido uno de los errores más grandes de mi vida.

translation.en: I miss you so much that I totally quit smoking.
translation.es: Te extraño tanto que dejé de fumar.

translation.en: And candy is only mildly comforting.
translation.es: Y los dulces solo me reconfortan un poco.

translation.en: - You've ruined all my vices for me. - Hmm.
I thought I wanted a holidate,

translation.es: que solo te quiero a ti.

translation.en: And weekdays too would be nice.
translation.es: Y entre semana también sería bueno.

translation.en: - - I know I'm probably too late,
translation.es: Sé que quizá sea demasiado tarde,

translation.en: you're the only one I'd wanna go through chemo with.
translation.es: solo contigo quiero pasar por una quimio.

translation.en: Oh. No, no, no. No. I'm-- I'm fine.
it really was the worst Thanksgiving of my life.
translation.es: fue el peor Día de Acción de Gracias de mi vida.

translation.en: That was an opening, by the way.
translation.es: Esa fue una oportunidad, por cierto.

translation.en: - How about New Year’s Eve? - Yes!

translation.es: BIENVENIDOS A LA FABULOSA LAS VEGAS, NEVADA
